title: Tokopedia Customer Insight Daily Report
description: Daily report providing insights into customer demographics and behavior on Tokopedia

Time.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'

Buyer.description: Total number of buyers on the specified day

Man.description: Number of male buyers on the specified day

Woman.description: Number of female buyers on the specified day

Not_mentioned.description: Number of buyers with gender not mentioned on the specified day

New_buyer.description: Number of new buyers on the specified day

Regular_buyers.description: Number of regular buyers (not specified further) on the specified day

Loyal_buyer.description: Number of loyal buyers (not specified further) on the specified day

Followers.description: Total number of followers for the Tokopedia store
